line.lineText: Hello adventurer! I am the Yulefather! Usually I would greet you with gifts and cheer, however the fearsome ice dragon Natan Athach knocked my sleigh from the sky and all my presents fell to the ground - if you recover them, I'll reward you with a fantastic Diadem of Ice!

Merry Yuletide, [class]! Thank you for helping me to recover those presents. I have another Diadem of Ice for you to earn, if you're interested? I also have Yuletide Helper's Hats!

Merry Yuletide, friend! Yule is the celebration of Winter - a time to embrace the cold, to spend time with our family and friends, to feast and make merry around a roaring fire. Of course, Yule is also a time for giving gifts to all the good boys and girls. However, that's where I have a slight problem.

I was travelling over Lir's Reach on my magic sled, pulled by the flying boars you see before you, when all of a sudden I was blown off course by a strong wind that spilled all of my presents over the land below! If you help by bringing me five Red Yuletude Presents from around Farcrag Castle, then I'll give you a Yuletide Hat as a reward!
Have you managed to find five Red Yuletide Presents, [name]?
Good work, [name]! Here's a nice Yuletide Hat for your troubles. Thanks for finding my Red Yuletide Presents, but my Green Yuletide Presents are still missing. Perhaps you'd like to help me again?

My Green Yuletide Presents were scattered all over Lir's Reach when my sled got blown off course! There are a lot of missing presents out there, [name], and I have special Yuletide Helper's Hats for anyone who helps me find them. Perhaps you'd like to help me?

Bring me ten Green Yuletide Presents and I'll give you a coloured Yuletide Helper's Hat as a reward. I'll have a rummage in my bag and pull out the first hat I find, so I can't say which colour you'll get - some are rarer than others! Will you get those presents for me?

The green Yuletide Helper's Hat is the most common hat I have. The red and orange hats are both quite common, and the yellow hat is the next most common after that. The pink hat is rare, the turquoise hat even more so. The blue hat is the third rarest hat I have, and the purple hat is the second rarest. The black hat is the rarest I have - if you get one of those, you'll be very lucky!

I make the Diadems of Ice by collecting the ice crystals that form in the Dansyren - the great lights seen in the night sky during winter. In addition to a range of colours, some rare diadems are imbued with sparks of magic, or with the freezing winter snows. The luckiest of adventurers may find themselves rewarded with one of these rare diadems.
